response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I propose a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is truly worth $8,000. I trust that this price reflects not only the quality but also the potential return on investment for you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
